ygData.subject: RE: Gob Pets in Oasis?
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of GM organized events....the other day on my server (Xegony) a GM took over the Tae Archeon in Cazic Thule.....he was a lvl 50 Wizard and was casting
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of GM organized events....the other day on my server (Xegony) a GM
took over the Tae Archeon in Cazic Thule.....he was a lvl 50 Wizard and was
casting Ice Comet.....he killed everybody...no one lost any exp though which
was cool....the GM did finally fall to a Lvl 50 Mage named Hast who hangs
out in CT actually helping people!!! That's right a lvl 50 who helps
people.....anyways Hast told me he got a FULL set of rubicite armor and a
shiny mettalic robe off the GM controlled Tae Archeon.....WOW is all I could
say

Brennin Lightblade
LVL 33 Warrior
Protectors of Light


-----Original Message-----
From: Lanadina the Magician [mailto:lanadina@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 1:40 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Gob Pets in Oasis?

From: "Lanadina the Magician" <lanadina@...>

They are gone now. Apparently, the EXP was TOO easy. They
were only hitting
for 40 if that, and I could actually see my experience bar
moving in level
30 (which is sometimes impossible to see since its a barrier
level).

Alas, I went back to Oasis AND Lake Rathe, and the doggies
are now gone.

Lana


----Original Message Follows----
From: Sean.Clark@...
Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Gob Pets in Oasis?
Date: Thu, 5 Aug 1999 11:12:58 -0600

From: Sean.Clark@...

I just saw a post on one of the Stratics boards concerning
an over-run of
Aqua Goblin Pets in Oasis....apparently the wolves are all
over the place
for the last few days and giving very easy EXP.
Anybody have any info on this to share???
